channel.title: Torn - Epic Server - Good Economy - Custom Minigames
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/27zw2oj.png[/img] [size=12pt][b]Torn is a friendly and active server. Owned by Christopher, this server has lots of potential compared to others. We have an active and strong staff team, who will assist you in anything. Also weekly events, and a great eco system! Below, will be a list of all this servers amazing features, and why you should join today!![/b][/size][/center]
[b][u]Forums:[/u][/b] www.tornrsps.com [b][u]Play Now:[/u][/b] http://www.tornrsps.com/webclient.html
[b]Torn is a 24/7 Active Server. We may be looked upon as any other ordinary server, however this is far from the actual truth, TornRSPS unlike many servers, is a server created for the players. We strive on creating the 'Perfect' server.
We know and understand that the players come first before anything which is why we are always open to suggestions. Our friendly and helpful staff will be there to assist you throughout your stay at TornRSPS. We accept bug reports and even personal Staff assistance on our Forums.[/b]
[center]Features:
[size=12pt] -ALL Weapon Specials 100% -All Skills Working -Highscores -Auto-Voting with REWARD! -Events @ Holidays -Staff Support -Active Forums -Flawless Switching -Turmoil and SoulSplit -Drop Parties every month! -Custom Maze Minigame -Custom ::shops shopping area [/size][/center]
[center][size=12pt][b]Pictures:[/b][/size] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/wce4as.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2r7lf6s.png[/img]

item.title: Torn - Epic Server - Good Economy - Custom Minigames
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

You’ve already created 4 advertisements for this server, this is now the 5th. If you continue to breach the rules you will have your posting rights revoked and have the board set to read-only permissions. Please use your original thread which was posted here.

Good luck.

Read full topic

item.description:
@updater wrote:

[center]
[size=12pt]Torn is a friendly and active server. Owned by Christopher, this server has lots of potential compared to others. We have an active and strong staff team, who will assist you in anything. Also weekly events, and a great eco system! Below, will be a list of all this servers amazing features, and why you should join today!![/size][/center]

Forums: www.tornrsps.com
Play Now: http://www.tornrsps.com/webclient.html

[b]Torn is a 24/7 Active Server. We may be looked upon as any other ordinary server, however this is far from the actual truth, TornRSPS unlike many servers, is a server created for the players. We strive on creating the ‘Perfect’ server.

We know and understand that the players come first before anything which is why we are always open to suggestions. Our friendly and helpful staff will be there to assist you throughout your stay at TornRSPS. We accept bug reports and even personal Staff assistance on our Forums.[/b]

[center]Features:

[size=12pt]
-ALL Weapon Specials 100%
-All Skills Working
-Highscores
-Auto-Voting with REWARD!
-Events @ Holidays
-Staff Support
-Active Forums
-Flawless Switching
-Turmoil and SoulSplit
-Drop Parties every month!
-Custom Maze Minigame
-Custom ::shops shopping area
[/size][/center]
